title: Nightmare Abbey - structure of final paragraph

content.prompt: The arrangement of details in the final paragraph primarily has the effect of

choices.label: emphasizing an unexpected turn of events in Mr. Glowry’s life
contrasting Mr. and Mrs. Glowry’s perspectives
underscoring Mr. Glowry’s interest in literature
hinting that Mr. Glowry’s pleasures in life are fleeting

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain the function of a particular sequence of events in a plot.
